alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 20 at 4:18AM MDT until March 20 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Animas River Basin and San Juan River Basin. * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin
